main event: Three lights, slightly brighter than the surrounding stars, were observed moving at a uniform speed while flashing on and off. The witnesses believed the object was an aircraft with three lights.
interesting points: The object was estimated to be at an altitude of 2,000-3,000 feet and traveling in a westward direction.
The object appeared capable of maneuvering and moving at speeds far beyond the capabilities of any known aircraft.
The object started out uniform and steady, then appeared to break up into a fan-shaped cluster of smaller objects that streaked across the sky.
The witness had never seen this or a similar object before.
The object was observed for approximately 30 seconds.
sighted object: three lights, slightly brighter than stars, moving at uniform speed and flashing on and off
